body.p:
74
Harrodsburg 4 June '61
Govr Magoffin
D Sir,

We have formed a Home Guard for our town under the late law on that subject, our officers are good & true men, and I think we are entitled to arms, we are in that portion of the state where slavery exists to a considerable extent, and we wish to be armed, please give attention to this for us and see that we get good arms

Truly yr friends
W A Hode
Chr Chinn
P. S. This will be handed you by Capt Cardwell our captain

Home Guard
Mercer Co
Capt Cardwell
